title: ‘We Were the Hunters, Now We Are the Hunted:’ Visma-Lease a Bike isn’t Resting on its Laurels
content:
The once-underdog, now-mighty Dutch super team is pushing the accelerator in 2024: 'The mentality doesn't change. We do not sit back and relax.'

Read the full article at ‘We Were the Hunters, Now We Are the Hunted:’ Visma-Lease a Bike isn’t Resting on its Laurels on Velo.
author: ahood
